{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Billion |model=BiPAC 7402GX |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/22/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=QI3BIL-7402GX |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX94610 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6GH-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip1_model=CX94610 |wi1_chip2_brand=Conexant |wi1_chip2_model=CX50221 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=wlan-ap |default_ssid_regex=^wlan-ap$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''3G/ADSL2+ (802.11g Wireless) VPN Firewall Router with USB 2.0 port''
[http://www.billion.com/product/3g/bipac7402x-3g-adsl2-wireless-vpn-router.html Product page] The device is shown as using a '''SiGe''' SE2527L / 2527L 2.4GHz power amplfier in the FCC photos. The FCC test report lists the following additional models as covered by this FCC ID.. *BEC 7600GX *BiPAC 7402G R3 *BiPAX 7402GXL *BiPAC 7402GL R3 *BEC 7600GT Default settings are per the FCC manual.
